name: Spaceship Shooter
description:
This my secound game I made with Game Maker Studio.

It's a top down shooter with grafics and sounds. I used tutorials from Tasty Blue Games, a german YouTuber, as an example.

I hope you enjoy playing and please leave a comment!

It's only for Windows at the moment but I'll publish a Linux and mac Edition!

[v1.6.1]

-added score

-added highscore table

-added new enemy

-added a new level

-bugfixes
